bbzl.name: Bamboozle
bullets: Bamboozle is an online multiplayer game based on a board game.
Used Node.js running Express.js for views and routing with Socket.io for real time interaction.
Running on a DO Ubuntu droplet with Nginx as reverse proxy and PM2 for management.
As of 2020, there are around 100 players around the world playing daily.

sniper.name: Course Sniper
bullets: Designed and developed the front end of the web application that is used by over 7,000 Rutgers students every semester, assisting them with class registration.

rudirect.name: RU Direct
bullets: Developed an android app for the bus system at Rutgers University during HackRU 2015.
Continued to maintain the project resulting in over 10,000 Rutgers students using it daily.
As of 2019, Rutgers changed their services to TransLoc, resulting in the shutdown of this app.
